const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://server-production-aebe.up.railway.app';// Update here if server URL changes
export async function login(email,password){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/auth/login"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error((await res.json()).msg||'Login failed');return res.json();}export async function register(email,password,name){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/auth/register"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password,name})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error((await res.json()).msg||'Register failed');return res.json();}
